entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS failing in CI due to SIGKILL #78893
  • Multiple PRs failing with WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests failure #78892
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'size != 0' during 'Generate code' #78891
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to specify propety name in `JsonExtensionDataAttribute` and work in oposite way #78890
  • ExecutionEngineException when deserializing generic [DataContract] on iOS (Realease Build, only through app store) #78889
  • Slow codegen when using Vector128/256<T> parameter #78883
  • Generic virtual method pointer lookup failure in .NET 7 Native AOT #78882

Closed

  • Test failure global::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplySubtractSingle() #78584
    8.0.0
  • MetricsEventSource, unreachable logging branch #78625
    Future
  • Support non-allocating view on string properties values of JSON in System.Text.Json.JsonElement #78885
  • .NET 7 issue with `IntPtr` when `LangVersion` < 8 #78878

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • measure the perf impact of deduplicating IsCompleted call in GetConsumingEnumerable #78887
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Align version option in System.CommandLine usages #78886
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Change MetricSpec.TryParse to be Parse #78729
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix chrome downloads to unbreak CI #78884
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Initial mobile workload testing (Closes: #75015) #77561
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow inlining in some over-bugdet cases #78874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Consolidate approach for conditional tests that check for privileged processes #78793
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2053999 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Alternative fix for GC pal linking (without the size_t related change for MacOS) #78792
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 Android workload could not be loaded #29242

PullRequests

Updated

  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2053916 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Discussion: Provide an easier way to add MetaDataReferences from Types #65627
  • Make `Covert to raw string` refactoring understand interpolation #65625
    Backlog
  • Unhandled exception. System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime, Version #65624

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65626
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move `UseExplicitTupleNameCodeFixProvider` to `VerifyCS` #65623
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65620
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65621
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider if it is available #65614
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • inheritdoc order fixes #54494 #54618
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #45301
  • Cannot debug Blazor Webassembly on Chromium. #45299
  • Is it possible to limit file upload speed? #45298
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #45297

PullRequests

Created

  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2054017 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Navigation / Back Button has page title of current page not previous page; slow/delayed to change navigation page #11691
  • MauiIcon ForegroundScale does not work on development machines that use a comma as a decimal seperator #11685
  • Deeplinking on Android causes crash #11684
  • java.lang.SecurityException when using share on Android #11683
  • Can't create APK file - Error AMM000 #11682
  • Could not find HandleOpenURL virtual method from MauiUIApplicationDelegate #11681
  • [iOS] Spacing between `Header` and `FlyoutItems` on iOS only #11679

Closed

  • Entry Unfocus not working on Android #11606
    Backlog
  • problem when i run the app #11515
  • [Android] Content wrapped in NavigationPage objects in Tabbed Page disappears after tabs navigating #9743
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MauiIcon ForegroundScale on systems with comma as decimal separator #11690
    community ✨

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11671
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entity Configuration using IsRowVersion.HasConversion<byte[]> for Sql Server fails if derived entity uses OwnsOne config #29689
  • Database migration creates wrong name when AspNet Identity Role is customized #29688
  • Tpt mapping Sql Query #29687
  • Lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29685
    8.0.0
  • Just upgrade from .net 6 to .net 7 and get an issue on "await app.RunAsync();" #29684

PullRequests

Created

  • Thanksgiving project: lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29686

Updated

  • Remove s from AppendInsertAndSelectOperations #29678

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • When installing SDK 8.0, the installation wizard should say .NET 8.0 /dotnet8 #14952
